blockVpn.name: Block VPNs
blockVpn.description: This will attempt to block activity that may be related to or be using a VPN.

siteName.name: Site name
siteName.description: Your site name to fill in the blanks.

geoIPAPIKey.name: Free GEO IP API Key
geoIPAPIKey.placeholder: Enter your Free GEO IP API key...
geoIPAPIKey.description: This is the API that will be used to check localisation for one of the methods of catching VPNs, you can get a free API token and put it here.

ProtectJSCheckOverLinks.name: Protect.JS Check over links
ProtectJSCheckOverLinks.description: Toggles Protect.JS's ability to scan over the document for links and replaces them with checks protecting the user.
